Package renderer

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    ThreadPool.ParamGetter<T>
    The ParamGetter<T> should be implemented in order to give the thread pool's threads a parameter when they start a new job.
    ThreadPool.Runnable<T>
    The Runnable<T> should be implemented in order the thread pool's threads to run with a given parameter.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    BasicRayTracer
    finds intersections between the ray and the scene, and calculates the color of the closest intersection
    ImageWriter
    Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
    ImageWriterTest
    Unit tests for renderer.imageWrite class
    RayTraceBase
    Abstract class to find the intersections of ray with the scene
    Render
    Class which create the color matrix of the image from the scene
    Render.RenderBuilder
    Builder Pattern, by this class we are updating the parent class (Render), instance that we are interested in creating even before we create it
    RenderTests
    Test rendering a basic image
    RenderThread
    Class which create the color matrix of the image from the scene
    RenderThread.Pixel
    Helper class to represent a pixel to draw in a multithreading rendering.
    RenderThread.RenderBuilder
    Builder Pattern, by this class we are updating the parent class (Render), instance that we are interested in creating even before we create it
    ThreadPool<T>
    This class is handling a thread pool.
    Video  
    VideoTest
